text: Ohe yara imana enecha! Tomadera danakhayaratake byartha kare diyo na krtajnatapase abad'dha kare o aghata hene, tara mato ye tara dhanasampatti kharaca kare lokadera dekhanora jan'ye ebam ye imana ane na allahâ€Œra prati o akheratera dine. Kaje'i tara udaharana hacche masrna patharera upamara mato, yara upare ache dhulomati, takhana tara upare name jharabrsti, gatike take phele rakhe khali kare! Tara ya arjana kareche tara kono-kichura upare'o tadera kartrtba thake na. Ara allah abisbasi lokadera hedayata karena na.
